events.name: Halloween 2023
events.description: Halloween: Welcome to the first event of IALR. New infected are coming to the map that will be wearing costumes. New Apex predator Infected are coming that can move faster and have stronger attacks. These can be rarely found around the world with legendary gear along with the ability to spawn them through the mod config and potentially with a Module added for the top tier players who really want a challenge. Enemies will drop body parts which can be sold to traders for money, trophies, or legendary gear or turned into legendary camo
